title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 88.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 88.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

Section
1105
of the Insurance Law provides that when an authorized insurer proposes to cease to maintain its existing licensing status in this State, it shall submit a plan that will protect the interests of the people of this State. Such plan must be approved by the Superintendent of Financial Services before becoming effective. The purpose of this Part is to implement these provisions of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
88.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
